TextView.android:text: Each player receives 4 cards. Without looking at them, they arrange them in a row face down. The remaining cards form a draw pile. On their turn, a player draws a card from the draw pile and decides whether to replace one of their own cards with it. Then, they place a card in the discard pile. Pay attention to action cards, as they can change moves and determine the game's outcome. Get rid of high-numbered cards and aim for lower ones!The round ends when a player believes the total value of their four cards is the lowest. They then declare out loud: Chatulkat! The player with the lowest total score at the end of all rounds wins the game. Enjoy playing!
